force_delete.description: Determines whether to forcefully delete the repository, including all images, when the resource is destroyed.

image_tag_mutability.description: Specifies whether image tags can be mutated after they are created. Valid values are 'MUTABLE' or 'IMMUTABLE'.

name.description: The name of the ECR repository to be created.

tags.description: A map of tags to assign to the repository for organizing and managing resources.

scan_on_push.description: Indicates whether images are scanned after being pushed to the repository (true) or not scanned (false).

encryption_type.description: The encryption type to use for the repository.

kms_key.description: The ARN of the KMS key when `Encryption Type` is `KMS`. If not specified, uses the default AWS managed key for ECR.

lifecycle_policy.description: The lifecycle policy document. This is a JSON formatted string.

repository_policy.description: The repository policy document. This is a JSON formatted string.
